name: Prehistoric Planet
description:
!Disclaimer: Starting the game takes a VERY long time (2-5 min) but it starts eventually.

Controls

  • WASD - Movement
  • E - Interact
  • J - Journal
  • Shift - Sprint
  • Ctrl - Sneak
  • Space - Take Damage

This game was solo-developed over 2 weeks for the 10th Pirate Software Game Jam https://develop.games/gamejam/ . The theme was “Nothing is explained”. Therefore I will not explain how to play the game. Just explore and have fun!

There are a lot of things that I could not fit in before the deadline so its a very early prototype.
-------------------------------------------------------

One day I'll revisit this game to polish it and add everything in the original design doc like:

  • Fixing the long load time
  • Dino AI / Combat
  • Crafting
  • Harvesting
  • Cooking
  • Eating
  • Status Effects
  • Menu
  • Saving
  • More animations / Better art
